mapper.insert: insert into registration (pId, payType, rLName, dId, uId, hasMedicalHistory, rFee, rDate, rStatus) values (#{pId}, #{payType}, #{rLName}, #{dId}, #{uId}, #{hasMedicalHistory}, #{rFee}, #{rDate}, '已挂号')
mapper.select:
select registration.rId,registration.pId,pName,pBirth,pSex from patient,registration
uId=#{uId} and registration.pId=patient.pId and rStatus='诊毕' and FROM_UNIXTIME(registration.rDate,'%y-%m-%d')=CURDATE() and pName like "%"#{pName}"%"

select registration.rId,registration.pId,pName,pBirth,pSex from patient,registration
uId=#{uId} and registration.pId=patient.pId and rStatus !='诊毕' and FROM_UNIXTIME(registration.rDate,'%y-%m-%d')=CURDATE() and pName like "%"#{pName}"%"

select registration.rId,registration.pId,pName,pBirth,pSex from patient,registration
uId=#{uId} and dId=#{dId} and registration.pId=patient.pId and rStatus='诊毕' and FROM_UNIXTIME(registration.rDate,'%y-%m-%d')=CURDATE() and pName like "%"#{pName}"%"

select registration.rId,registration.pId,pName,pBirth,pSex from patient,registration
uId=#{uId} and dId=#{dId} and registration.pId=patient.pId and rStatus !='诊毕' and FROM_UNIXTIME(registration.rDate,'%y-%m-%d')=CURDATE() and pName like "%"#{pName}"%"

select rDate,rStatus,pName,pAddress,registration.pId,department.dName from registration,department,patient where rId=#{rId} and registration.pId=patient.pId and registration.dId=department.dId and FROM_UNIXTIME(registration.rDate,'%y-%m-%d')=CURDATE()
